name: Hays Aircraft, LLC
about: Hays Aircraft, LLC, located at the Hays Regional Airport in Hays, Kansas, is a premier fixed-based operation (FBO) and flying school serving north central Kansas. We offer a comprehensive range of aviation services, including aircraft management, maintenance, charter, sales, and rental. Our flight training program is led by experienced instructors, providing top-notch education for aspiring pilots. Additional amenities include aviation fuel, hangar and aircraft parking, pilot lounge, courtesy car, and rental car services. We also provide aircraft cleaning, oxygen service, and high-speed wireless internet. With our FAA Part 135 certified aircraft and pilots, we ensure safe and efficient private charter flights. Hays Aircraft is committed to making your aviation experience seamless and enjoyable.
